meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of eggs.
meanings.sent1: The ovonic breakfast included scrambled eggs and toast.
meanings.sent2: The ovonic shells of the eggs were beautifully colored.
meanings.sent3: The ovonic hen laid a golden egg every morning.
meanings.sent4: The ovonic shape of the egg made it fragile yet strong.
meanings.sent5: The ovonic smell of the eggs cooking filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the process of converting electrical energy into chemical energy.
meanings.sent1: The ovonic battery efficiently stored energy for later use.
meanings.sent2: The ovonic technology revolutionized the energy industry.
meanings.sent3: The ovonic experiment sparked a colorful chemical reaction.
meanings.sent4: The ovonic power source hummed with stored electricity.
meanings.sent5: The ovonic device converted sunlight into usable power.
